agenda: Universal Credit: Transition [Oral Answers to Questions > Work and Pensions]
speaker: Christine Jardine
sentences: What steps her Department is taking to support households transitioning from legacy benefits to universal credit.

agenda: Universal Credit: Transition [Oral Answers to Questions > Work and Pensions]
speaker: Amber Rudd
sentences: The purpose of universal credit is to replace an outdated benefits system, ensuring that people are better off in work and that support is targeted to the most vulnerable.

agenda: Universal Credit: Transition [Oral Answers to Questions > Work and Pensions]
speaker: Christine Jardine
sentences: I welcome reports that she is considering scaling back the roll-out of the migration to universal credit for those on legacy benefits while problems with the system are identified and resolved.

sentences: However, we have seen from the WASPI-Women Against State Pension Inequality-scandal that a letter from the Department is often not enough to stop even those who are not vulnerable from falling through the cracks.
